data.name: Monolith Jack
data.detailed_description:
Hey!

Rewrite this! Tell me something about Monolith Jack, an upcoming mystery adventure game from first time indie developer Gushmush.

Hey!

Rewrite this! Tell me something about Monolith Jack, an upcoming mystery adventure game from first time indie developer Gushmush.
data.short_description: Monolith Jack, an upcoming mystery adventure game from first time indie developer Gushmush.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: CPU 1.2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

data.legal_notice: Monolith Jack is the property of Gushmush and Cody Achord.
